Package IO

Class TextFileManager

java.lang.Object
IO.TextFileManager
public class TextFileManager
extends java.lang.Object
A class to read and write to text files. I made this separately to not have to repeat this ever, and to re-use it in future projects. It'll probably grow when I need to do more things. We had to modify it a bit this time around, but thank god I had it pre-made. Thank you past me!
Author:
igtampe

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TextFileManager​(java.lang.String Filename)
    Creates a text file manager.
    TextFileManager​(java.lang.String Filename, java.lang.Boolean Overwrite)
    Creates a text file manager.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void print​(ciic4020.list.ArrayList<java.lang.String> StuffToPrint)
    Prints each string in the list out into a file (with each element representing a line) (will overwrite!)
    java.lang.String toString()
    Gets the first line of the text file being managed.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • TextFileManager

      public TextFileManager​(java.lang.String Filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a text file manager. If the file doesn't exist, it'll create it.
      Parameters:
      Filename - The file you want to manage
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it cannot create it.

    • TextFileManager

      public TextFileManager​(java.lang.String Filename, java.lang.Boolean Overwrite) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a text file manager. If the file doesn't exist, it'll create it.
      Parameters:
      Filename - The file you want to manage
      Overwrite - If true, TFM will delete the file and create a new, empty one, in its place.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If it cannot delete, or create the file.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Gets the first line of the text file being managed.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      The first line of the file

    • print

      public void print​(ciic4020.list.ArrayList<java.lang.String> StuffToPrint) throws java.lang.Exception
      Prints each string in the list out into a file (with each element representing a line) (will overwrite!)
      Parameters:
      StuffToPrint - An arraylist of the stuff you want to print to this file.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if it cannot write to the file.
